revision.text:
'''Events''' are limited-time durations in which players are given the chance to capture unique Pokémon. Events usually occur in conjunction with real-world holidays (e.g. Halloween, Christmas), or coincide with the anniversary of important events in the Pokémon franchise (e.g. release of the first movie, release of ''Pokémon GO''). In most cases, the special Pokémon are added to region [[Roaming Pokémon|roamer]] pools. ===Details=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Event !! Unlock Time !! Pokémon 1 !! Pokémon 2 !! Pokémon 3 !! Pokémon 4 !! Where to find event Pokémon |- | Flying Pikachu || July 6 - 12 || [[File:Flying Pikachu.png|50px]] Flying Pikachu || || || || |- | Armored Mewtwo || July 18 - 24 || [[File:Armored Mewtwo.png|50px]]Armored Mewtwo || [[File:Bulbasaur (Clone).png|50px]]Bulbasaur (Clone) || [[File:Charmander (Clone).png|50px]]Charmander (Clone) || [[File:Squirtle (Clone).png|50px]]Squirtle (Clone) || |- | Halloween || Oct 30 - Nov 5 || [[File:Spooky Bulbasaur.png|50px]]Spooky Bulbasaur || [[File:Spooky Togepi.png|70px]]Spooky Togepi || [[File:Pikachu (Gengar).png|50px]]Pikachu (Gengar) || Other Ghost Pokémon appear as well || Added to route Pokémon pools,
one per region for Kanto, Johto, and Hoenn |- | Lets GO! || Dec 14 - 21 || [[File:Lets Go Eevee.png|50px]]Lets go Eevee || [[File:Lets Go Pikachu.png|50px]]Lets go Pikachu || - || - || Roamers in Kanto |- | Christmas || Dec 24 - 30 || [[File:Santa Dragonite.png|50px]]Santa Dragonite || - || - || - || Roamer in Kanto, Johto, and Hoenn |} [[Category:Unique Pokémon]]
